Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory284.jpg'}
{3: 'You arrive at the transport craft twenty minutes in advance. In addition to Lucia, who was already waiting, you see Lee and Liv also standing there.'}
{2: 'Why are you guys here?', 3: '9'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Because Lee and I have been worried sick about you...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Even though we aren't going on the mission together, we at least wanted to see you and make sure you're alright.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She looks you over worriedly.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'You look pale.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '...Commandant.', 4: '3'}
{2: "At least I'm free.", 3: '17', 4: "I'll get some rest after the mission.", 5: '17'}
{3: 'After talking with everyone for a short time, Chrome arrives with Strike Hawk.'}
{3: 'He gives a simple greeting, then sends the intel he had prepared to your terminal.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "With regard to the extra mission President Hassen assigned us, I've already prepared the intel and holo-map for the twenty-one target personnel we need to rescue.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "In order to expedite their return to Babylonia, I've asked the liaison officer to meet with us at a pre-determined location and time on the Forgotten Streets of City 075.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "If there are no further questions, let's get going.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'What is it?'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "I'm just glad you're okay.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Wanshi remains quiet as he considers their current predicament.'}
{3: 'Boarding the transport craft, you feel as if you are being monitored.'}
{3: 'Turning quietly, you see several personnel occasionally looking up from their work in your direction.'}
{3: 'Chrome turns to look behind you, sensing their watchful eyes.'}
{3: 'Among the crowd, a man wearing a white lab coat grabs his attention.'}
{3: 'The man is slouched over like a lonely and weak middle-aged man.'}
{3: 'Only those dark golden eyes vaguely remind Chrome of someone he had just met.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Worker', 3: "Mr. Kurono, please hurry up. You're going to be late for the meeting.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Does he have something to do with Kurono?', 3: '46'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'When I was still a member of Kurono, I accidentally came across his data file. I thought he was on the board of directors, but turns out his name is just a coincidence.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'He\'s just a doctor who\'s now working for the Star of Life. But this time, his name "coincidentally" appeared on your inspection reports.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "But enough of that. You should get going. There's no time to waste.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ignoring the unsettling scene behind them, the group turns and boards the transport craft.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory283.png'}
{3: 'Riding on the cold afternoon wind, the two transport crafts land in the abandoned ruins of City 075.'}

{3: 'Having established contact beforehand, a large group of stranded personnel is waiting at the landing zone. While the other team members go to speak with the stranded Constructs, Camu makes a break for the underground waterway.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Are there any personnel in critical condition?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Female Construct', 3: "Yes, I've placed everyone on the first floor for the time being. Right this way.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Wanshi nods, then follows her.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'The other team has arrived.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Chrome looks at the notification on his terminal and relays it to the team.'}
{2: 'Other team?', 3: '66', 4: 'Right, Hassen mentioned there will be others...', 5: '66'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Well, according to the plan, Cerberus will also be participating in cleaning up the Red Tide, but they're acting independent of us.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct A', 3: 'I thought you were going to come looking for us once you were finished...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'I thought so too, but the captain said that saving people was our top priority.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Counting the wounded over there, how many people are gathered here?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Captain', 3: 'Nineteen. Two are still MIA.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct Captain', 3: '...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct Captain', 3: 'The two missing Constructs... are from my team.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Do you know which way they ended up going?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Captain', 3: 'They went to an area that was suddenly reported as a high concentration zone.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct Captain', 3: 'But they were heading there even before we received the warning.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct Captain', 3: 'We tried to notify them, but we had already lost contact.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Return to Babylonia once everyone receives emergency treatment. We'll look for your missing comrades.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Construct Captain', 3: "Let me go with you. They're my comrades, after all.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's too dangerous. You should head back.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Construct Captain', 3: "They're my comrades. I can't leave my team behind!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct Captain', 3: "Our commandant is gone... I can't lose them, too! I'm begging you!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alright.', 3: '95', 4: "No, it's too dangerous.", 5: '99'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "Commandant, the area is dangerous even for us. We're better off ensuring the safety of one more person if we can.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "We can't risk losing another person.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'I agree with the commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "The area is dangerous even for us. We're better off ensuring the safety of one more person if we can.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Captain', 3: "You must be Chrome... I've heard about you.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Construct Captain', 3: "I appreciate your concerns for my safety, but as the captain of your team, I'm sure you understand.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Construct Captain', 3: 'If your team members are in danger, would you abandon them for the sake of your own safety?', 4: '2'}
{3: "The Construct captain's plea awakens some distant memories in Chrome's heart."}
{2: 'Construct Captain', 3: "If this is the last time I see them, I'll regret it for the rest of my life!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Construct Captain', 3: "I may be a soldier, but I'm not the property of Babylonia.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Construct Captain', 3: 'At least... Give me the right to decide how I die!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Chrome hesitates for a moment.'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "I understand your feelings, but as a soldier, you can't disobey mission orders.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'If your only mission here is to cooperate with the rescue and return to Babylonia...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "By allowing you to accompany us, I'll be aiding in your violation of military orders.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Thinking about the sense of surveillance along the way, Chrome casts a sideways glance at the transport craft behind him, hinting to the Construct.'}
{2: 'Construct Captain', 3: "Mission...? Oh, right! There's still one objective!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The Construct quickly opens his terminal. On the mission log, one objective is still active.'}
{2: 'Construct Captain', 3: "Our last objective is to search for the commandant... But we still haven't found him.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Construct Captain', 3: 'My team and I split up to search for him.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Construct Captain', 3: 'But judging from the location of his disappearance and given the time... He probably...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Then continue with your mission.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct Captain', 3: 'Roger! Thank you, everyone!', 4: '2'}
{2: "What's your name?", 3: '127', 4: '(Look down at the personnel data on the terminal.)', 5: '131'}
{2: 'Construct Captain', 3: "My name's Percy. Our two MIA comrades are Ersi and Reyna.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Looking at the personnel data gathered by Chrome, you find detailed descriptions of the captain and his comrades.'}
{3: 'Captain Name: Percy. Service Time: 4 years. After transferring teams three times, he has served his most recent team the longest.'}
{3: 'Member Name: Ersi. Service Time: 2 years, 7 months. Ever since joining the Task Force, he has served the current commandant.'}
{3: 'Member Name: Reyna. Service Time: Less than 1 year. No additional data on this new recruit.'}
{2: 'Alright. Aside from Percy...', 3: '137'}
{2: 'Everyone else, board the transport craft.', 3: '138'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Wait here, Commandant. I'll help the wounded board the transport craft.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "We've got a difficult mission ahead of us. Considering how long you were monitored, take this time to catch up on some rest.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia takes out a bottle of nutri-aid and a compressed biscuit.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'When I asked about your condition while you were being monitored, everyone said you were kept well-fed, but I was still worried... So I brought some from our supplies.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Thank you.', 3: '146', 4: '(Take nutri-aid and compressed biscuit)', 5: '146', 6: "Well-fed... That's one way to put it...", 7: '146'}
{3: 'With a bitter smile, Lucia wants to say something, but she is worried about the watchful eyes. Instead, she quietly places the nutri-aid and compressed biscuit into your hands.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Alright, let's go help. I bet Wanshi's almost done with emergency treatment.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'While everyone else is busy helping the crowd onto the plane, you have a rest until all eighteen Constructs depart as scheduled'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Time to go, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory345.jpg'}
{3: 'Right at that moment, Cerberus jumps into the underground waterway through the blast hole.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "That damn transport plane is crawling with micro recorders! They're like maggots!"}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Why don't we blow that **** up?"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'And then what? Ride you back to Babylonia?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Bahaha! I was just kidding. Let's blow it up when we get back."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Looks like some people are leaving no stone unturned, considering they've bugged our transport craft, too.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: "They've bugged Noctis' frame, too."}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Huh?!'}
{3: 'Noctis grits his teeth and clenches his fists.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "When I get back, I'm gonna blow up those pieces of ****!"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Use all that C4 you call a brain and think for a second. Few people would go to the lengths of bugging our support equipment. I bet it was you-know-who's henchmen.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Pfff... So we can't just get rid of them?"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "No need. We're not their target.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Vera turns her head, leans over to the camera on Noctis' frame and smiles cheerfully."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Isn't that right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Then let's get this godforsaken mission over with."}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'We have three objectives.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'First, we need to use these stupid disks to clear the Red Tide, then locate our target.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Let's split up and get this over and done with.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'What about our objective to follow the Gray Raven Commandant as much as possible?'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'The key word is "as much as possible." We\'ll do just that.', 4: '1'}
